def_cn: 天秤宫，天秤座（黄道十二宫之一。出生于9月23日至10月22日之间的人属此星座）
def_en: Libra is one of the twelve signs of the zodiac. Its symbol is a pair of scales. People who are born approximately between the 23rd of September and the 22nd of October come under this sign.

def_cn: 出生于天秤宫时段的人
def_en: A Libra is a person whose sign of the zodiac is Libra.
